about.title: About
about.name: Fabien ANTOINE - Independent Expert
about.bio1: Trained as an engineer in artificial intelligence research, I have acquired over 23 years solid expertise in Information Technology strategy and management, as well as data and artificial intelligence innovation and strategy.
about.bio2: I enjoy solving business problems and building business value, adapting a vision based on state-of-the-art and innovation to practical field cases, taking into account constraints and costs.
about.bio3: Since 2025, I offer consulting services in strategy, architecture and innovative development in IT, data and AI for clients in Montreal and Paris.
about.backgroundText: Former Colonel, Deputy CDO at Justice and Interior Ministries (FR), AI Lead, Complex program management (budgets €20-100M/year, teams of 50-100 people)
